messages.subject: Yahoo Tsuba
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all, I was browsing Yahoo Japan for a bit of fun and came across this http://page.auctions.yahoo.co.jp/jp/auction/57923663 It appears to be a lesser version
messages.messageBody:
Hi all, I was browsing Yahoo Japan for a bit of fun and came across this
http://page.auctions.yahoo.co.jp/jp/auction/57923663

It appears to be a lesser version of one on the NCJSC site from the
Shonai Shoami School.
http://www.ncjsc.org/item_tsuba_shonai_shoami.htm

Would it be the same school or a copy ?, for me it ( the yahoo one ) is
still a great piece but has nothing on the NCJSC tsuba.

Rich






http://www.ncjsc.org/item_tsuba_shonai_shoami.htm


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
